properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova chesina upakaaramula kai Aayana kemi chellintunu Yehovaa naamamuna praardhana Jesedanu rakshana paatra chebooni{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehovaaku naa mrokkubadi Chelinthu Yehovaa daasudanu nenu Yehovaa prajalalo Yerooshalemulo Ellappudu stutinthu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thalli garbhamuna roopimpa badak Munupe nannu erigitivi Thalli garbhamu nundi bayalu padaka Munde pratistinchitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}poorna manassutho nannu vedakina Nannu kanugondu rantivi Karunatho neeve nannu vedaki Rakshinchitivi prabhuvaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Doosha kudanu himsakudanu Haani karudanai yuntini Daasunigaa nannu jesi kontivi Doshamula baapi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Idi nee korakai viruva badina Naa shareeramani yantivi Idi nee papa kshama korakai Chindina rakhtamantivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu krupatho naadu Yesu Nannu neevu rakshinchitivi Kaadu naadu kriyala valana Idi devuni varame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cheppa nashakyamu mahimaa Yukhtamu nee vosangina Santoshamu thappa kunda Halleluya paata paadedan{/lang-eng}
